entry.title: Strawberry Waffles
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,984Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 176

Summary: “Like a date?” You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. “Yeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.” Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. “Um, y- yeah.” You stammer before clearing your throat softly. “Yes.” You say, more confident in your answer. “Yes, I would.. love to go with you. On a date. To the dance.” Or Jason Todd becomes a girl dad after dying and coming back to life

Summary: Jason tried one last time to negotiate, offering something he usually guarded with his life – his secret identity – to an alien, but unsurprisingly, you couldn't care less, simply pointing once more at what you wanted from him. entry.title: so only one hand may rest its palm upon my cheeks
entry.summary:
Author: rileywhooshhh

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,308Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 20

Summary: batfam soulmate aus! all are standalone   You're pretty good at reading people, and you don't sense hostility from this guy, but the anonymity of not being able to see his face is intimidating you. When he gets close to you, you cower, holding the book in front of your face defensively. "You thought a book was going to hurt me?" he speaks, the sound low and gruff, lower than natural standards, and you're sure there's a voice modulator in his helmet. With a wince, you peek at him from behind the book, nodding slowly. "I guess I didn't really.. think it through."   Or, your soulmate dies young. You don’t expect to see him again, but the universe had other plans.

entry.title: Christmas Surprises
entry.summary:
Author: Ava_Mae

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,453Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: Her niece?Fuck.He let his arm drop so that he wasn't pointing his gun at her anymore. "Wait-- are you Jules?" The woman gave him an odd look. "Yes, I am.""Shit." He holstered his gun and took a step back, trying to look as unthreatening as he could manage. ~"No, that's not--" She let out half a laugh, sounding a little disbelieving. "I meant…" She shook her head. "Jules has given me gifts," she said quietly. "Christmas, birthdays, whatever. But I've… I've never had anybody else give me something that… I dunno, has this much meaning behind it." Ouch. She deserved nice things, and Jason kinda hated the fact that she was so completely unprepared for it. She touched the charm again, then glanced up at him again. "...you sure you're not gonna regret giving this to me?" she asked, a tiny bit hesitant.Never in a million years. "Yeah, pretty sure," he replied.

entry.title: Under Protection
entry.summary:
Author: Nightly_Darkk

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,297Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 24

Summary: The mission sounded simple at first: protect Gotham's most infamous vigilantes in their civilian skins. The reality? Nothing is simple in Wayne Manor. The secrets there cling like shadows to the wall and for all of Batman's insistence of strategy, it's starting to feel a lot more like scheming. The BatBoys are restless, sharp, always watching. Constantly bristling at the idea of being protected.And in the middle of it all is her. A girl so unaware of the storm coming closer to her door each day. She isn't supposed to be there. She isn't even supposed to matter. But she does- and no one can say why. The was told to protect them. Nobody said what they'd have to protect themselves from.
